channel.title: Avatars and/or signatures
channel.description:
[font=comic sans ms]Hello people of Moparscape,
My question: I want to make avatars and/or signatures. So... what programs do I have to use for 3D/4D graphics orsomething? I've done nothing before on making avatars/signatures, so I ask ur help. I just want to start off easy.
Questions:
*What programs do I need to use? *Easiest way to make avatars and/or signatures
Kind regards, Wesley1299[/font]
